attributes.action: domestic violence talks in schools uk
attributes.additional_details: im campaigning to get free domestic violence awareness an talks in secondary schools, as a victim of domestic violence myself i believe this is a very good cause an feel that it will be very beneficial to young girls to be made aware of the signs of domestic violence, it could save many lives, an stop many girls going through what i have been through, domestic violence is very serious an dangerous an more needs to be done to raise awareness an prevent this horrible crime
